metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8124 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Insufficient validation and sanitization of user input exists in url-parse npm package version 1.4.4 and earlier may allow attacker to bypass security checks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8124` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.4.7-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.7-3').
